segments.text: Do you think I should join the basketball team , Mary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not ? If I were you , I certainly would .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I'm afraid it'll take up too much of my time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As the saying goes , work while you work , play while play . All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy , you know ?
segments.speaker: S2
